query: Pay ₹500 to Axis Bank credit card in cred

steps.action: Tap on the 'Credit Cards' tab at the bottom to manage cards
steps.description: Launch the CRED app and view the home screen with options like pay contacts, bills, refer, and more.

steps.action: Scroll to the Axis Bank credit card
steps.description: Navigate to the credit card management screen where you can view total due, spends, and offers.

steps.action: Tap on the Axis Bank credit card to expand its details
steps.description: From the list of cards, select the Axis Bank card which is marked as 'Fully Paid' and offers a 'Pay more' option.

steps.action: Enter ₹500 in the amount input field
steps.description: Input the desired payment amount using the keypad provided and tap on 'Proceed to pay'.

steps.action: Tap on 'Pay now' to complete the transaction using the selected UPI account
steps.description: The final screen confirms the payment details including amount, discount, and chosen UPI account.

query: Add Dell laptop to cart in flipkart

steps.action: Tap on the 'Electronics' category from the Flipkart home screen
steps.description: Flipkart home screen with various category icons including Grocery, Fashion, Electronics, and Mobiles.

steps.action: Scroll and tap on the 'Laptops' banner to enter laptop deals
steps.description: Promotional laptop section with categories like ASUS, HP, Acer and active banners for ongoing offers.

steps.action: Scroll down and tap on the Dell Vostro i5 tile
steps.description: A featured listing for Dell Vostro i5 with specs (Intel 12th Gen, up to 16 GB) and price.

steps.action: Tap on the Dell Vostro 3520 item in the search results
steps.description: Search result listing Dell Vostro 3520 model with offers, price cut, and delivery details.

steps.action: Tap 'GO TO CART' to confirm item was added
steps.description: Product page of Dell Vostro 3520 with an 'Item added to cart' confirmation and options to buy or go to cart.

query: Check the chart for NIFTY 50 index on kite zerodha

steps.action: Go to the 'Watchlist' tab at the bottom
steps.description: This screen shows your watchlist with various indices like NIFTY 50, SENSEX, and more.

steps.action: Tap on 'NIFTY 50' from the list to open more options
steps.description: You can browse through major indices. Selecting NIFTY 50 opens a detailed action menu.

steps.action: Tap on 'View chart' from the popup menu
steps.description: A bottom sheet opens with options like View chart, Set alert, and Add notes.

steps.action: Analyze the chart for NIFTY 50
steps.description: This screen displays the NIFTY 50 candlestick chart with indicators like RSI and volume.

query: Book a flight from Bengaluru to Pune on 8th April on makemytrip

steps.action: Tap on 'Flights' and start a one-way search
steps.description: The home screen shows options like Flights, Hotels, Holiday Packages, Trains/Bus, etc.

steps.action: Review what needs to be changed in default fields based on your query. Click on 'From'
steps.description: Default values are populated by default. Select 'One Way' for a one-way flight.

steps.action: Change the From field from default to Bengaluru
steps.description: List of locations is shown. Select Bengaluru from the list of suggested cities.

steps.action: Change the destination from New Delhi to Pune
steps.description: Update the 'TO' field by selecting Pune from the suggested cities list.

steps.action: Choose the departure date as April 8, 2025
steps.description: A calendar view opens. Select April 8, 2025, which is priced at ₹3,557.

steps.action: View available flights from Bengaluru to Pune
steps.description: You see a list of flights. Select filters like Cheapest, Non-stop, and Discounted Price.

steps.action: Select the IndiGo flight departing at 00:50 AM
steps.description: Choose flight 6E 6563 from IndiGo which reaches Pune at 02:15 AM for ₹3,557.

steps.action: Check baggage details and cancellation policy
steps.description: Cabin bag: 7 kg, Check-in: 15 kg. Fare is non-refundable. Option to lock price is available.

steps.action: Enter traveller details
steps.description: Add adult details like name, email, phone number. Optionally add a GST number.

steps.action: Review all details and click on 'Continue'
steps.description: Special fares for Armed forces, Senior citizens, and Students with discounts are shown.

steps.action: Select a preferred seat
steps.description: Choose seat 2B from the free seat category. Seat selection adds ₹601 to fare.

steps.action: Choose in-flight meal (optional)
steps.description: You can add meals like Paneer Tikka Sandwich or Chicken Junglee Sandwich to your booking.

steps.action: Select add-ons like Flight Delay Protection
steps.description: Add insurance for ₹99 which provides ₹1,000 compensation if flight is delayed by 1+ hour.

steps.action: Review trip and traveller details
steps.description: Final confirmation of flight, traveller info, selected seat, and meal/add-on options.

steps.action: Proceed to payment page and choose payment method
steps.description: The total fare is ₹4,508 including seat fee and convenience charge. Multiple payment modes available.

steps.action: Enter card details and complete payment
steps.description: Enter CVV for your card and tap 'PAY NOW' to complete the booking process.

query: Check and claim daily rewards on CRED

steps.action: Go to the CRED home screen
steps.description: You’ll see various sections like pay contacts, rewards, shopping, and your available coins at the top right.

steps.action: Tap on the rewards banner or go to 'Flash Deals → Rewards'
steps.description: Navigate to the rewards section where you can check today’s rewards and claim offers like jackpot prizes.

steps.action: Tap on 'Claim now' to check today’s sponsored reward
steps.description: A special prize like a phone or discount voucher will be displayed. You can tap to proceed to the spin screen.

steps.action: Tap 'Spin' to use your coins and try for a reward
steps.description: Each spin costs a set number of coins (e.g., 1000). You can win jackpots or vouchers depending on your luck.
